description: Highly accomplished Team Lead and Full Stack .NET Angular Developer with 7+ years of experience in building and delivering scalable enterprise applications. Proven track record of leading cross-functional teams, architecting cloud-integrated solutions, and driving successful project deliveries across diverse domains including Healthcare, Fintech, Logistics, and HR Management. Adept at leveraging modern frameworks like .NET Core, Angular 18, Azure, and AWS to deliver innovative, secure, and performance-driven applications.
detailOrQuote: Led full-stack teams across multiple .NET Core and Angular projects, ensuring timely delivery and adherence to high coding standards.
Collaborated directly with clients, business analysts, and product owners to gather requirements and define project scope and architecture.
Owned project planning, sprint management, and technical decision-making while mentoring junior developers and ensuring best practices.
Implemented reusable architecture components for cloud-based applications using .NET Core, RESTful APIs, and Angular.
Developed secure and scalable backend systems using Azure Functions, Azure B2C, Blob Storage, and JWT Authentication.
Built responsive frontends using Angular (v6 to v18), HTML5, CSS3, and integrated them with .NET Web APIs.
Worked on Azure and AWS cloud environments for deployment, CI/CD, and infrastructure scaling using Docker.
Delivered high-performance SaaS applications in domains such as healthcare (Medcompass), logistics (Coll-8), fintech, and e-commerce.
Contributed to product design, architecture planning, sprint reviews, and daily standups as part of Agile teams.
Built WebAssembly-based apps using Blazor and modernized legacy systems with modular .NET and Angular codebases.
Integrated third-party APIs such as Google Maps, PayPal, Stripe, and implemented secure login systems using Azure B2C.
